official_title: To amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974, the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, and the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to resolve questions of coverage under those Acts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974, the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act, and railroad retirement tax provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions relating to employer coverage.

titles.title: To amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974, the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, and the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to resolve questions of coverage under those Acts, and for other purposes.
